newsitem.title: USA: Crescent Operating shrs to begin trading.
newsitem.headline: Crescent Operating shrs to begin trading.

text.p: Crescent Real Estate Equities Co said Thursday trading and distribution of shares in Crescent Operating Inc will begin June 13.
The shares will initially be listed on the OTC Bulletin Board under the symbol "COPIV," Crescent said.
Merrill Lynch & Co will serve as principal market maker in the shares, and mailing of shares is expected to be completed by June 27, the company said.

The initial assets of Crescent Operating will include warrants to acquire about 1.3 million shares of common stock of Magellan Health Services Inc and 100 percent of the stock of a construction equipment sales, leasing and servicing company.

They will also include a 1.21 percent interest in a private venture capital fund and a 50 percent interest in a newly formed limited liability company that will operate about 90 behavioral healthcare facilities, Crescent Real Estate said.

Crescent Operating sold its 12.38 percent limited partner interest in a partnership that owns the Dallas Mavericks basketball team on June 11 to a newly formed subsidiary of Crescent Real Estate Equities Ltd Partnership.
